methods.name: getTierPayouts
methods.shortDescription:
Returns the Affiliate Tier Payouts and their associated Affiliate Tier
for the specified Goal ID.
methods.longDescription:
Returns an associative array indexed by Tier.id, ordered by Tier.id ascending, with value being an associative array containing two hashes: AffiliateTier AffiliateTierPayout If the Goal does not have tiered payouts enabled, returns NULL. Sample return: 
{
  3: {
       "AffiliateTier": {
         "id": "3",
         "name": "Individual",
         "status": "active",
         "level": "5",
         "is_default": "0"
       },
       "AffiliateTierPayout": {
         "offer_id": "522",
         "affiliate_tier_id": "3",
         "payout": "2.00",
         "percent_payout": null,
         "modified": "0000-00-00 00:00:00",
         "id": "63",
         "goal_id": null
       }
  },
  ...
}

response.description: List of Affiliate Tier and Affiliate Tier Payout.

methods.name: getTierRevenues
methods.shortDescription:
Returns the Affiliate Tier Revenues and their associated Affiliate Tier
for the specified Goal ID.
methods.longDescription:
Returns an associative array indexed by Tier.id, ordered by Tier.id ascending, with value being an associative array containing two hashes: AffiliateTier AffiliateTierRevenue If the Goal does not have tiered revenues enabled, returns NULL. Sample return: 
{
  3: {
       "AffiliateTier": {
         "id": "3",
         "name": "Individual",
         "status": "active",
         "level": "5",
         "is_default": "0"
       },
       "AffiliateTierRevenue": {
         "offer_id": "522",
         "affiliate_tier_id": "3",
         "revenue": "2.00",
         "percent_revenue": null,
         "modified": "0000-00-00 00:00:00",
         "id": "63",
         "goal_id": null
       }
  },
  ...
}

response.description: List of Affiliate Tier and Affiliate Tier Revenue.

methods.name: getTierRevenues
methods.shortDescription: Returns the Affiliate Tier Revenues and their associated Affiliate Tier for the specified Offer ID.
methods.longDescription:
The response is an object with Tier.id indices, with value being an associative array containing two hashes: AffiliateTier AffiliateTierRevenue If the Offer does not have tiered revenues enabled, returns null. Sample return: 
{
  3: {
       "AffiliateTier": {
         "id": "3",
         "name": "Individual",
         "status": "active",
         "level": "5",
         "is_default": "0"
       },
       "AffiliateTierRevenue": {
         "offer_id": "522",
         "affiliate_tier_id": "3",
         "revenue": "2.00",
         "percent_revenue": null,
         "modified": "0000-00-00 00:00:00",
         "id": "63",
         "goal_id": null
       }
  },
  ...
}

response.description:
Offer model object with Affiliate Tier Revenue
                model object.

methods.name: setTargetCountries
methods.shortDescription: Set a list of Countries and/or Regions that an Offer should use for geo-targeting.
methods.longDescription:
This is a bulk replacement for any existing countries/regions currently set, so any that are not included in the
call to this function will be removed at the same time.
Note that in order for geo-targeting to be enforced the Offer must have "enforce_geo_targeting" enabled.

parameters.name: country_codes
parameters.description: A list of country codes to target on.  If Region-level targeting is desired, this parameter should be passed as an object where each property is a country code and the value for each country code is an array of region codes for that Country.

response.description: True if successfully created/updated Offer Country.

methods.name: addTargetCountry
methods.shortDescription: Add a Country and optionally one or more regions within that country to the geo-targeting list for an Offer.

parameters.description: Multiple regions codes within the specified Country to target.  NOTE: this should not be provided if the "region_code" parameter is passed.

parameters.name: region_code
parameters.description: A single region code within the specified Country to target.  NOTE: this should not be provided if the "regions" parameter is passed.

response.description: True if successfully created.

methods.name: removeTargetCountry
methods.shortDescription: Removes the specified Country (and any Regions targeted within) from the Offer's geo-targeting list.

response.description: True if successfully deleted Offer Country.

response.description: True if successfully created Offer Country Region.

parameters.name: region_code

response.description: True if successfully deleted Offer Country Region.

methods.name: getOverview
methods.shortDescription: Gets an overview containing various Offer-related counts.
methods.longDescription:
If matching Offers are found, returns:
  "active_offers" (Number of Offers having a status of "active"),
  "pending_offers" (Number of Offers having a status of "pending").

If matching Affiliates are found, additionally returns:
  "pending_applications" (Number of Offer approval applications which have a status of "pending"),
  "pending_offer_pixels" (Number of Offer Pixels with a status of "pending"),
  "pending_conversions" (Number of Conversions having a status of "pending" which are less than 7 days old)

parameters.name: offer_filters
parameters.description: Filter by Offer fields and boolean operators.  The counts will be applicable only to matching Offers.

parameters.name: affiliate_filters
parameters.description: Filter by Affiliate fields and boolean operators.  The counts will be applicable only to matching Affiliates.

response.description:
List of the counts of active and pending Offers. Along
                with the counts of pending Affiliate Offer applications,
                pending Offer Pixels and pending Offer Conversions.

parameters.description: The TargetRule properties (name, regular expression, etc), represented as JSON-formatted object string.  This accepts a JSON-formatted object string rather than an object directly because we may wish to accept explicit null values for some regexes.

response.description: The new TargetRule

methods.name: deleteTargetRule
methods.shortDescription:
Deletes the specified TargetRule and any TargetRuleOffers associated with it, so long as the referenced Offers
are not active.
methods.longDescription:
Only allows deletion of Brand-source rules.
Disallows deletion of TargetRules that are referenced by CashflowRules -- they should be manually removed prior
to deletion of the Rule.

response.description: The Offer IDs using this TargetRule.

methods.name: getActiveUsesOfRule
methods.shortDescription: Returns all active offers and cashflow groups (if enabled) that reference a specific TargetRule.
methods.longDescription:
These dependencies are affected whenever a TargetRule is modified.
In order to remove a TargetRule there must not be any active offers or any cashflow rules referencing it.

response.description:
Returns an associative array with two indexes: offers, cashflow_groups, each of which
                     contains objects with 'id' and 'name' representing all the active offers and cashflow groups
                     that reference the specified targeting rule.
                     If this brand does not have the enable_cashflow_groups preference enabled, only returns
                     the offers count.
